title: Magic Bristle Cleaning Gloves
description: Give tough-to-reach places a thorough scrubbing with Magic Bristle Gloves. With thousands of durable, non-scratching bristles on the fingers, it's easy to get inside, behind and in between faucets, drains, even microwaves, while keeping your hands clean and dry. Safe on stainless steel and non-stick, they'll change the way you do dishes, too. Latex-free. Machine washable. One size fits most. One pair.
